title: Shabbat Dinner (2012) - Short film about coming out - Official R
description:
Available on YouTube, now official release on bittorrent.

With a special version before color correction, ADR, and motion stabilization. See what the film looked like before post-production magic fashioned it into something more professional.
 <a href="
http://shabbatdinnerfilm.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://shabbatdinnerfilm.com</a>

If you ever wanted to know what it's like to be a teen coming out and struggling to figure out who you are, watch this short film that got a standing ovation from the 1,400-seat Castro theater in San Francisco.

OFFICIAL SELECTION AT OVER 50 FILM FESTIVALS WORLDWIDE

William doesn't know he's gay until he meets Virgo at a family dinner. The two teens attempt to discover who they really are, while their oblivious parents chatter about fundraisers and dairy-free ice cream.

World Premiere, Hong Kong International Film Festival
Audience Choice Award, ZERO Film Festival NYC
Audience Choice Award, Barcelona International Gay & Lesbian Film Festival
Crystal Cactus Award (Best Gay Film), Out in the Desert Film Festival
Best Comedy, Amsterdam Gay & Lesbian Film Festival
Audience Choice Award, 2nd place, Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival
Official Selection, Frameline 36
Official Selection, NewFest NYC

DIRECTED BY
Michael Morgenstern

STARRING
Chris London
Dan Shaked
Eva Kaminsky
Michael Wikes
Dawn Yanek
Peter Tedeschi

14min


== CONTAINS ==

* Main edition of the film (7mbit, 720p, Quicktime h.264)
* Version before ADR, motion stabilization, reframing, and music (1.5mbit, 720p, Quicktime h.264)
* High-quality poster



== NOTE FROM MICHAEL ==

Hey there,

Thank you for downloading the film! Bittorrent is a double-edged sword.
ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s easier than almost any other method to get high-quality content,
but it also threatens to make filmmaking unsustainable for creators.

If you enjoy the film, please watch my new one at lilyinthegrinder.com
and share it with people!

It takes a lot of money to make these, so feel free to send something
via PayPal. Actually, it means even more if you can share the film with
friends, and take a look at my new one at lilyinthegrinder.com

Shabbat Dinner is available on YouTube, and Lily in the Grinder is
easily embeddable in your blog with embed code available on the site.

Thanks very much and enjoy the film.

Sincerely,

Michael Morgenstern
